text:
Apartemen gaya Hotel yang terletak di Lokasi Strategis di Jakarta
Baru masuk, disambut dengan pengamanan yang Bagus, semua mobil yang masuk di periksa, dan gak sembarang orang bisa masuk. Masuk di Lobby nya aja nyaman dan disambut dengan ramah. Mau masuk ke lift, dalam lift, masuk kamar semua pakai kartu, tandanya sangat aman, bahkan ke kolam renang pun pakai kartu baru bisa masuk. Kebetulan saya pesan 2BR, ruangan sangat luas, ada dapur dengan peralatan yang lengkap, ruang tamu, meja makan, dan kamar yang besar dengan view yang indah, di dalam kamar diberi 3 ac, jadi mau ngatur kedinginan di ruang tamu lain, di kamar 1 lain, di kamar 2 lain, sesuai selera kita.
Sarapan pagi juga sangat bervariasi setiap hari menunya lain - lain, dan makanan nya enak. Semua terlayani dengan baik. 
Check Out juga waktu itu proses nya cepat. Ada Free Shuttle ke Mall - Mall terkenal. Pokoknya Mantap, senang bisa menginap di Fraser dan berharap bisa kembali lagi, gak cukup nginap cuma 4 malam disini

text:
Kamar sangat nyaman dan luas, peralatan dan amenities cukup lengkap.  Tersedia juga mesin cuci bila membutuhkan.  Cocok untuk keperluan bisnis, maupun dengan keluarga karena tersedia 2 bedroom apartemen.
Pelayanan bisa dibilang rata-rata saja, bahkan cenderung kurang bila dibandingkan hotel sekelas lainnya.  Saya meminta alat penjernih ruangan (karena waktu itu hanya tersedia smooking room), sampai meminta 2x baru diberikan.  Saya mendapat kesan hotel ini kekurangan staff untuk melayani tamu.
Fasilitas lainnya bisa dibilang rata-rata saja, tempat sarapan kecil, dan pastinya staff resto sangat kurang, karena kewalahan saat jam sibuk sarapan.  Saya menginap 4 malam, dan 3 dari 4 kali sarapan harus kecewa dengan habisnya makanan yang tersedia.  Bahkan 1 hari, semua menu makanan habis tidak tersisa.  Sepertinya baru sekali ini saya mendapati makanan habis semua di hotel berbintang.  Terlihat hotel tidak siap menerima tamu yang banyak.
Overall, saya sangat merekomen kamar yang luas dan nyaman.  Bila hal-hal lain tidak menjadi concern anda, hotel ini bisa dipilih.  Salah satu keunggulan adalah lokasi di tengah kota dan dekat dng Jl Sudirman.
title: Kamar bagus dan nyaman, pelayanan pas-pasan, dan sarapan yang buruk

text: Untuk ulang tahun saya, saya memutuskan untuk staycation di Fraser Residence Menteng karena saya sudah mencoba Fraser Residence yang di Sudirman waktu tahun baru sebelumnya, dan pengalaman saya sangat baik di sana. Namun dibanding pengalaman saya di Sudirman, pengalaman saya di Fraser Residence Menteng terasa agak kurang - mungkin karena tempatnya lebih kecil dari Fraser Residence di Sudirman, dan kualitas makanan in-room diningnya kurang memuaskan. Tapi semua staff benar-benar melayani kami dengan baik, dan kualitas kamar serta interior fasilitasnya secara keseluruhan benar-benar bagus. Overall, saya merasa bahwa Fraser Residence Menteng lebih tepat untuk yang ingin santai sejenak dari kepenatan kota tanpa diganggu banyak orang.
title: Tempat yang nyaman

text:
Satu-satunya yang bisa dinikmati hanya kamar yang masih baru.

In-room dining (nasi goreng) ayam gorengnya tidak fresh, baunya tak sedap.
Breakfast standard sekali malamnya hanya sedikit.

Staf hotel jauh sekali jika dibandingkan dengan hotel bintang lima seperti mulia atau Shangri-la.

Dua kali saya keluar hotel menggunakan kendaraan pribadi keduanya dimintakan biaya parkir, padahal kendaraan saya sudah didaftarkan free parking ketika check in.

Ketika saya sedang check-in salah seorang staf di front office sedang sibuk menelepon dengan menggunakan bahasa 'sleng' (lo, gw, dll) sangat tidak nyaman di telinga.

Yang lebih tidak menyenangkan lagi adalah ketika saya harus kembali untuk mengambil barang saya yang tertinggal dan saya memerlukan waktu lebih dari 30 menit menunggu untuk mendapatkan barang-barang saya karena mereka sibuk menjawab telpon masuk yang berkelanjutan dan membiarkan saya menunggu begitu lama.

Akankah saya kembali ke hotel ini? Tidak.
Apakah saya menyarankan untuk menginap disini? Tidak.

text:
Fraser Residence Menteng bukanlah hotel, melainkan sebuah service apartemen yang kebanyakan ditujukan untuk tamu yang tinggal lama. Namun berbeda dengan tempat ini yang juga menyediakan tempat bagi orang-orang yang ingin tinggal untuk beberapa malam saja dan membutuhkan perlengkapan rumah yang lengkap. 

Seperti saya yang baru saja menginap di sini bersama istri serta anak saya yang masih berumur 1,5 tahun dimana kami membutuhkan tempat tinggal dengan perlengkapan dapur yang bisa dipakai untuk memasak makanan anak kami. 

Selain itu unit di Fraser Residence Menteng ini cukup child friendly dimana di dalam unitnya tidak banyak terdapat benda-benda tajam sehingga kami bisa membiarkan anak kami berkeliaran di dalam unit tanpa takut ada benda tajam. 

Ini adalah kedua kalinya saya sekeluarga menginap di sini dan jika berlibur ke Jakarta lagi akan menginap di sini lagi.
title: Sebuah pengalaman yang menyenangkan

text:

The Relish restaurant serves delicious ala carte meals. However, the breakfast was just average due to limited varieties. All in all, it is a good place for family and business trips as it is situated in a strategic location. Mini marts, fast food, and restaurants serving local delicacies can be found within walking distance.

The second time was a much better experience with the exception of the inconsistency of the houseekeeping service.
Some days they cleaned so well, some days they didn't. There was a week that the floors were so sticky that it made a sound when walking with slippers. Also, the housekeeper forgot to close the door properly after cleaning my room. I came home (after 7pm) with the door unclosed. This happened for several days; then I decided to report this to the housekeeping department and told the maid on duty regading this; since it could be a security issue for female guests. It never happened after that. 
The overall property is well maintained and the staff  is friendly and eager to help. I prefer this location rather than the other two Frasers. The location is not a walking distance to shopping malls, but couple blocks from local stores and restaurants. For locals, walking is no problem to these places, but to first time visitors to Jakarta, crossing streets could be dangerous. However, there is daily shuttle bus to/from Plaza Indonesia and Grand Indonesia, two major malls in Menteng area. Catching taxi is easy too. 
The rate includes buffet breakfast. The food is plenty, but don't expect that they are tasty and in good quality. I stopped going to buffet breakfast because there were children who screamed and ran around in the restaurant and some almost ran into the waiters. It wasn't a peaceful environment to start your day and deal with morning Jakarta traffic. My bread got taken lots of times by kids and parents from the toaster; no apologies, of course. I saw bread is taken by hands (and other dry foods, as well) and put them back by guests who changed their minds. Even though there is a clear sign in English/Indonesian not to that. My suggestion to management is to put all kind of bread inside clear bread box or just order bread in the plastic covers from suppliers. Overall I give between 3-4 stars for rating.
title: A very good hotel with room for improvement.

text:
I have been living at this property for the last 6 months with work. I can honestly say that I have never experienced service standards and attention to detail like it elsewhere - and I travel constantly with work. From my first enquiry to the end of my stay I have felt properly looked after. Fraser Menteng seamlessly blends together a home from home serviced apartment facility and high spec hotel. 

I stayed in a studio - I had been worried that it would be too small but it was totally fine, even when my wife and child came to visit. The rooms are very clean, very modern and well designed. Great views from higher floors. The food is really nice, and I used room service a lot - they also offer beer. The rooms are very well equipped with a more fancy Smart TV and entertainment system than most people have at home. Kitchens are properly stocked with decent equipment.The bed is extremely comfortable. Wifi is good.

Every service I have used has been excellent. The attitude of the staff is incredible - so friendly, thoughtful and responsive that you always feel at home. They even noticed it was my birthday and brought me a cake and gift! Whenever my wife visited she received a complementary fruit hamper and my son also was given a gift. At Fraser Menteng they go beyond what I have seen elsewhere. Every single member of staff from the security guards, through restaurant staff, chambermaids, bellboys, reception, maintenance men, tech people, gardeners, sales managers and duty managers all seem to care, smile and pay attention. Everybody knows you by name within days.

The pool is large and great and often empty. Gym is well equipped with modern gym equipment with social media and TV. Spa is excellent and very reasonable. There is also a sauna, a retreat and a guests lounge with Imacs. The location is very central in Jakarta and close to almost everything. The staff will find you a taxi easily and help direct the driver to where you need to be.

It is honestly hard to find fault with this property, but if there is one thing that could change I would ask for some more toys in the childrens play room - its a lovely facility but a bit light on toys.

Other than that this is truly a remarkable place to stay. It has impressed me so much that I am now in the process of booking Fraser at my next destination - Beijing. I wouldnt look anywhere else now I know about Fraser.
title: Comfort & Customer Service Excellence

Dear Christian and Garry, Many thanks for making my stay and my colleagues from Indonesian Business Centre at Frasers Menteng a pleasant one. text: Upon  arriving we were greeted by the hotel staff and checked in without any hiccups. Noticed that the lobby was of modern design and still looks new. Entering the door to the room the first thing we noticed was the kitchen. The kitchen was adequate and well stocked with the required utensils. The bedrooms had adequate square footage and had sufficient closet space as well. The bathrooms were well maintained and clean, and we were pleasantly surprised with the provision of the washing machine though we were not able to use it. The living room had more than enough room with a workstation provided and the corner of the living room. The available tv channels were enough though didn't had time to watch tv as we were out and about more than staying in the apartment. Overall the apartment was modern and well maintained at a reasonable price. However one suggestion that I might make would be for the residence to provide a complimentary shuttle either from or to the airport.
title: Quiet Place in the hustle bustle of jakarta

text:
My husband and I stayed in this hotel for 8 days from May 28 to June 5. We arrived at the hotel at midnight, we're welcomed by the bell boy, he helped us with the baggages and escorted us to the reception area and requested us to have a seat. We were the only guests but we waited about 15 minutes for the (female) receptionist to check us in to the room as she was counting some cash with her colleague. Since we were so exhausted from a very long flight, we proceeded to her reception counter when she seemed to be ready for us. Once we seated right in front of her, she immediately asked us for our passports without offering a welcome greetings nor smile. She gave us the room key after the registration was completed, however without wishing us a pleasant stay. I can tell the whole reception team was not friendly at all. We passed by them every morning (going for breakfast) and whenever we went out of the hotel but none ever cared to greet  nor give us a little smile. Within our 8 day stay in this hotel, nobody ever asked us how our stay was nor offered us any assistance. 

Breakfast at the main restaurant was very basic. The waiting staff was not attentive nor smiley. The chef needs to ensure the food quality served to the guests, my husband ordered vegetable crudities  by the pool and he was served with 3 types of vegetable including 3 pieces of ROTTEN celery stick. We asked the waiting staff to send back to the chef and they were replaced with the same quality of celery stick along with 2 portions of green tea ice cream as an apology. We had the ice cream but not the celery stick.

Though, I still would like thank the Security Team for being so friendly and helping me crossing the road and getting a cab when needed.

This hotel is located in Central Jakarta, however it takes 10 minutes (without traffic) by taxi to reach Grand Indonesia / Plaza Indonesia / Sarinah / National Monument (Monas).
title: We enjoyed the public and room facilities but this hotel lacks of friendliness

text:
The location is perfect because is close to the city center . Gambir railway station is only 5/10 minutes by the Taxi . The rooms are spacious and clean. We are talking about serviced apartments and believe me , here you will find everything you need ! We booked a bedroom executive on floor 16 wich is perfect for 2 people . As I said there are everything , a kitchen with all the accesories that you need for cooking , cutlery , chinaware and so on . So many amenities you will find in every corner of the apartment and this is wonderful !
There is a big bathroom with bathub and shower separate and there is a big washmachine with dryer ! Bedroom is perfect with a 2nd tv , big wardrobe and a wonderful and confortable bed . Living room is spacious and the view on Jakarta is impressive . The staff is very friendly at Relish restaurant , everybody are very nice , efficient and Anto is a very good waiter , congratulations ! The buffet is very rich and you will find everything about Continental , English and American breakfast and of course Asian delights .
There is only one negative issue affecting this perfect place and make me very disappointed ! I'm writing my review during my last day of permanence , tomorrow we will fly back to Italy . I ask to the receptionist if was possible to extend the check out about two hours , (normally is 12 p.m.) in order to give us the chance to reach the airport not very early ,  but carelessy she answered that was not possible ! How come ?!?! Before I book this place I read review from other guest who was so glad they extend check out and ... what about me ?! Why ? In every hotel all around the world if I ask for a late check out they will accept ! 
Dear Fraser Management our stay was wonderful and we will come back here but this inconvenience offended me !
title: Excellent but ...

text:
Positive:
Rate from Traveloka 1.349 K IDR (subjectively reasonable for every facility you can get)
The building is easy to find. 20 minutes from Thamrin. 

spacious parking space.

check in was fast, Ms. Tasya gave me 2room keys. very understanding. staff greets guests everywhere. very welcoming. 

Room 1303 had a beautiful view.

The room was spacious:
bathroom had a huge bathtub, jet shower, rain shower, and the washing machine was easy to be used.
kitchen had complete amenities. A fridge with freezer, a microwave, and sink. they provided plates, glasses, spoons, forks and knives in the room.

they gave me  2 extra bottles of  complimentary water. appreciated it.
The flat screen TV was huge with various chanels. They even provided DVD player.
very comfy sofa in the center of the room.
I found iron and umbrela in the closet.
AC worked well. very quiet surrounding.
very warm lighting throughout the hotel.

The Gym was open for 24hours. and it was well equipped, very spacious and clean. 
I used their spa facilities. The Sauna and the steam room were incredible.
I swam twice. in the evening and in the morning. staff were always around. towels were easily gotten.
the pool itself was crystal clear, long, wide and had 130 centimetres depth. very convenient for me. 

Breakfast was superb. I got bacon. the meals provided were cooked properly. I tasted no artificial flavour. 

check out was super fast. 

Negative:
nothing. the hotel itself was a heaven. 

Based on my stays in Fraser hotels around Asia (Fraser Sukhumvit Bangkok in 2010, Fraser Kuala Lumpur in 2013 and Fraser Menteng in 2016) I have to admit, the one in Menteng impressed me the most.

Thank you Fraser Menteng, I had a memorable experience. 

:-)
title: Room 1303. May 5, 2016

text:
A highly recommended serviced apartment for visitors who intend to stay in Jakarta for over one week. Staff are friendly and efficient, and speak excellent English (so no language barrier here). Nice pool and excellent 24-hour gym. There is an in-house spa which is reasonably and competitively priced. The apartments are big and well designed (albeit a bit cold) but the city views are excellent, especially from the bathroom! 

The one major issue with this property is the restaurant, which serves a limited selection of dishes. The Indonesian dishes are bland, even by "tourist" standards. I would have given 5 stars if not for the subpar dining experience.

However, there are many traditional Dutch/Speakeasy cafes one block towards the Cikini area that are extremely cheap yet delicious!
title: My Favourite Fraser Property in Asia

text: We only stayed for 1 night but wish it had been more. The accommodation was superb, very clean and great facilities. We ate at Relish, the restaurant in house, and the food was very tasty. All the staff were very friendly and professional. Don't miss the great massage chairs especially after a long flight.
title: Excellent place

text: The destination seemed to be central and the main attractions in Jakarta were a few minutes away by taxi. Even Ancol , Kota Dua and Taman Mini did not seem very far away. The view was ok, what you would expect to see of a busy city. The rooms were a bit small but the King bed in the master bedroom was super-comfy ! The bathrooms were not special but they were clean and their toiletries were very good quality. The sitting area and the kitchenette were lovely. We had breakfast once but the buffet was lacking in many choices that would be considered a staple for an international breakfast buffet. By 9 there was no cheese on the mirror tray and when I asked the waiters for some more since I was not lucky to get hold of any, they seemed surprised. Fifteen minutes later, a waiter came back with a tiny cube which I was to take contentedly. We would have also appreciated an egg station but only boiled eggs were offered. We had à la carte dinner twice in the same restaurant and the food was more than delicious ! The waitress was very nice and hospitable! The staff at the reception desk were very helpful and professional. They would escort us to where the taxi driver would be waiting outside and discuss our destinations with him, make sure we were safe, look for addresses, suggest outings, malls and restaurants. One of receptionist staff surfed the internet for more than 20 minutes trying to help us find a currency exchange bureau that would be open on Saturday. She called and made sure they would give us a fair rate. Kudos to the front desk staff of Fraser Menteng ! They were one of the highlights of our four day stay in Jakarta.
title: Great place

text:
Initially we wanted to stay in Sheraton Grand Hotel as we were attending a show there but due to the inflexibility of the room sales mgr pertaining certain request, we decided to stay in Fraser and we certainly are happy with our stay. From the security guards to the bell boy to receptionists, the service was great. 
Our 2 bedroom apt was spacious clean and had everythg we need. 
The gym and pool looked great and we love the OSIM Udivine chairs. 
If breakfast is not part of your packages then we recommended to skip it as it's pretty costly for a small spread.
Thank q Andi and Kirman. Kirman went out of the way to look for a box and tape for us to pack our thgs and AndI who checked us in was v funny and warm.
title: Excellent place to stay while in Jakarta

text: I stayed at Fraser Residence in a serviced one bedroom apartment for three months while working in Jakarta. The apartment was new, modern, clean, and sufficient for my purposes. However it was not large (I've stayed in hotel rooms larger), and the kitchen was not well stocked (only very basic utensils provided, small cooktop only, no oven).  Service was friendly and there was monthly activities for long term guests. Limited food options nearby but it is not hard to get delivery or room service. Overall, it was good option for a short business stay.
title: Good option for short stay serviced aparmtnet

text:
Stayed in Fraser Menteng for 6 nights and thoroughly enjoyed it. Lovely pool area and steam/hot sauna to wash off the grit. 
Very good room cleaning, good facilities, and friendly staff. Nice breakfast buffet. 
Only downside is there is little to explore on foot in the surroundings of the hotel. But in Jakarta you usually have to take a taxi when going somewhere anyway. 

Suggestion for improvement; there are no towels in the sauna/steam room area so you either have to bring one from your room or call reception for one. The hotel should provide towels. 

Room tip; get a north facing room and you won't be bothered by the nearby mosque prayer call.
title: Fraser Menteng gets it right

text:
I stayed in 2 bedrooms apartment with my family..the apartment was equiped with high end quality appliances..nice environment for bringing kids..I got little problem with the location of ac in bedrooms..it blowed directly to our heads..
Breakfast was very nice..american buffet..
The pool was great but sometimes too windy..
Overall it was very good..
title: Best homey apartment

text: Amazing hotel and residence right in the heart of Jakarta and very close to many of the sights, tourist zones, and mega shopping plazas. Excellent amenities like a combo washer/dryer en-suite, kitchenette, and a smart TV with wifi/smartphone connectivity built int. Strong internet in the rooms, great sound proofing so you'll never hear screaming kids or loud music, very nice gym and sauna/steam room complementary fort all guests. The staff were always very helpful with directions or special requests, or with helping me communicate with Uber/Taxi drivers. If you're not a fan of Uber or don't have mobile internet [although I can't fathom why, its so cheap in Indonesia] then make sure the staff call you one of the licensed taxis who use meters. I was very impressed with the quality of this property as well as the top notch service from all staff members - it reminded me of my stay at the Mandarin Oriental in Vegas. If you like having your own space in a luxury environment with all the benefits of being in a  hotel, you can't go whoring here. Oh, btw, they have properties just like this one all across Asia.
title: Gorgeous Property, Great Amenities, Friendly Staff, Very Safe

text: The hotel itself seems quite new. The rooms are well appointed, and the facility is quite secure. The breakfast is above average, and the service is good. On the downside, this is the first major hotel chain which charged me for early check-in and even a bucket of ice. The location is not really within walking distance to anything worth mentioning, but you can easily get a taxi to various restaurants and landmarks.
title: 2 Night Stay in Jakarta

owner_response.text:
Dear Sir, 

Thank you for your constructive feedback and on areas that we have delighted you and areas that we can improve upon especially for the room service charge for the delivery of the bucket of ice and for the early check-in.  

We do appreciate your feedback and we hope that this has not marred your overall with us.  We look forward to welcome you back to Jakarta soon and do contact us directly for your booking with details of your arrival time so that we can try our best to accommodate should an earlier than standard 2pm check-in is required.

Assuring you our best attention and services at all times, kind regards.  Patricia NG

text:
This is my second time staying at Fraser Residence in Jakarta. Last time I stayed at the other property in Sudirman. I liked everything about Fraser Menteng: location (easy to reach all major areas in the city, unless you're going to South Jakarta, in which case you probably want to stay in that area), quality of room furnishing, breakfast.

Some things stood out: 1. staff - they were great, attentive, and extremely helpful; 2. the Retreat - I love those massage chairs after a long day outside

All in all, highest recommendation possible.

text:
Hotel: The service apartment is well located within the CBD.  It has great amenities as with any service apartment should have.  The exterior of the hotel does not seem much but upon gaining entry, the good housekeeping shows.

Facilities: It has a good pool with a myriad of extras for the guests, such as free use of high quality massage chairs and lounges.

Service: Staff attitude is helpful, but they made me wait for more than an hour before getting to my room, without even offering a drink of water.

Meals: Did not try.

Room: Very well equipped rooms, can't ask for more.

Bathroom: I was impressed with the toiletries provided, quality stuff.  They even provided washing detergent for use with their washing machine cum dryer.

Room Tip: Choose the rooms facing the north to reduce the morning prayer broadcast from the mosque right next to the apartment.
title: Great Service Apartment

text:
I was welcomed by super friendly staffs.  They are well-trained and I can feel a genuine service.  I love the minimalistic deco of this place.  I stayed at one bed room suites.  It has kitchen (I mean, proper Kitchen with all the utensils).  One thing I really liked was washing machine/dryer in bathroom.  Jakarta weather is hot and of course need to change clothes every day!  It not only saved the money but also provided such a convenience which can't find in other normal hotels.  

Breakfast area was not big but very pleasant, overlooking swimming pool.  I stayed there for three weeks for my work and because it is residence style of hotel, I can see same group of people during breakfast.  I love it!  It made me feel home away from home.  I don't like big buffet in normal five star hotel with so many tourists in and out so if you are looking for proper business hotel with quite ambience, this is it!

Apart from all the facilities, I really enjoyed staffs' service.  They are attentive, good listener and not overly intrusive, which we often find in normal hotels.  This property is an excellent choice for both business and leisure trip.  You will not be disappointed!
title: Excellent choice for discerning travellers!

text:
From the moment of entering the lobby, the Frasers team were energetic and friendly. Since I was on a project for 5 days, the team quickly got to know my face and were engaged at all levels, from the cleaners to reception to the F&B team...each person seemed to take pride in their service and the hotel.  Rarely have I seen a team so genuinely positive on each interaction.  It was refreshing to head back each night, like being welcomed by family.  Thank you to everyone for making a long week away from home seem short.

The room (one bedroom) was more than ample size and with all the amenities of home.  The location was nice...close enough to the city centre and just far enough not to seem like I was stuck downtown...traffic was not an issue for my week.  

Overall, one of the best places I have stayed in Jakarta and am excited to go back for my next stay.

text:
It doesn't feel like Four seasons or Shangri-la Residence.
It's less on the luxury, more on the modern efficient facility you get.
Design and interior is 4.5/5 . I liked the modern look.
 
Residence is brand new: Probably 6 month old only. 
Area is on the edge of Menteng, on that huge traffic section. 
That's a terrible location. Too noisy from early morning throughout all day.

Staff: low quality of English, 
Terrible coffee making skills. 

Location: 
As for being on edge of Menteng, to get to Thamrin it's 5-25 (when is the worst traffic) minutes ride.
Walking will be the same (not that anyone should walk). 
U will be robbed.

Back to Hotel: 
If comparing to Fraser Residence Kuala Lumpur (the last Fraser i stayed at), the room is not as good.

TV/media section, too small, too cheap, cant view from bed.
Shower, missing a glass door: after ten mins of show Water all over the bathroom.

Kitchen fine, i didn't use it. 
Washing machine in room, didn't use it.

bed was great, small desk and working station not good enough, not big enough
NOT ENOUGH power plugs in the room.

Cleanliness of hotel: 5/5 !

Breakfast was included, was ok+ 
Gym is good, all u need and more. 
Saunas were nice.
Pool didn't try.

Not much more in the hotel, spa not open, 
But i think overall the clever design of having two blocks of elevators and in a way splitting the (anyhow small) floors into two give the extra privacy and feeling it's all yours.

I never once encountered any other guest in any lift ride, gym or Sanua.
Only in breakfast saw the other guests.

Will i return?
Probably not, still prefer the big four hotels around Thamrin, little bit more expensive but in 36 hour business trips to Jakarta location in KEY 

Do i recommend? Yes.
title: It is what it is: a (almost) 5* residence style hotel

text: Still value for money with a kitchen, living room and washing machine but the apartments start to look a bit tired after all the years and are in need of some necessary maintenance (and/or upgrades). Wallpaper is peeling off in corners, or bubbling as a result of previous water damage, spots on the mirrors, and ceiling shower heads that are spraying in all directions and need descaling. Shower water is rarely warm or hot, mostly lukewarm at best. The beds are good, but noise from neighbours is travelling, for example moving chairs in the apartment above make squeeky noises (simple solution: put felts under the chairs!)
title: Value for money, but in need of maintenance

text:
Frasers Hospitality, used to be a brand associated with superior quality and excellent service, it is no longer ingrained in their Brand DNA, at least for Frasers Residence Menteng. 

My recent stay at this Service Residence was a disappointment. Firstly, when I entered the room a stench of smell welcomes me. Most likely the guests before me did some cooking so it is imperative for the housekeeping to spot this before the room can be assigned to another guests. 

Having worked in the hospitality for more than 3 decades, I scanned through the room briefly to evaluate if the brand says what they stand up for. From cleanliness to newness and the quality of the furnishings, I must say most of the areas scored 6 to 7 at the very most. 

The Shower Room is dirty. It seems that it has not been scrubbed before. The Washer, dirt stain can be found and a pile of stale water at the Softener compartment, and a lot of stains at the rubber of the front loading door. Don't the Housekeeper trained to look at all these nuances? 

Most importantly, the Washer blocked the toilet door, and it cannot be closed. 

On my first night, the towel is almost time to discard, it is no longer fluffy but very worn.
The alarm clock has not been set, no sense of welcoming. 

Throughout my entire stay, not a single hotel personnel talked about Fraser World loyalty program. They are indeed lukewarm about everything. 

The quality of the breakfast is mediocre and the replenishing is very tardy. You have to wait, and since the spread is not extensive, it makes the wait longer. One of the day, there are 3 "rice" dishes. Plain Rice, Paella Rice and Porridge. The GM and Restaurant Manager should pay more attention to this. One of the "Rice" should perhaps change to Mee Hoon (Vermicelli or the likes). 

No one ask if you would like to have coffee or tea. You have to wave at them to serve you. It is a very small Restaurant, the most is 2000 sqft of Rectangular seating area. How difficult is for the staff to be proactive and be more service oriented? 

There is only 1 shuttle service to Grand Indonesia/Plaza Indonesia Shopping Mall at 11am. I wonder why there is only 1, it leaves you with no option given that the location of this hotel is not closed to any malls. 

The gym is quite sizeable with a few cardio, weight machines and free weights. Probably this is the best thing I can find in this hotel as far as hardware is concerned. 

In terms of superior quality, the only thing I can associate with is Malin + Goetz toiletries, other than that, I may conveniently think this is a local service apartment brand. 

It changes my perspective towards Fraser brand after this stay.
title: Disappointing Frasers

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.

I noticed that we failed to meet your expectations in several aspects of your recent stay with us. After careful review of your concerns, I offer you my deepest apologies for having failed to give you the service that our residents expect.

I would like to assure you that I have personally addressed these issues with our team members concerned and will ensure that they receive the necessary guidance to perform a much better role moving forward.

Once again, please accept our apologies and do not hesitate to let me know if I can be of any assistance to you anytime.


Thank you and warm regards.

Rina Pamungkas

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Park, 

Firstly thank you for taking the time to give us your constructive feedback.  

As for the receipt that you requested, we sincerely regret that there must be a misunderstanding. For the guest who used third parties such as a travel agent or online travel agent, the receipt will be issued by their side instead of from our side, while if you book directly to us, we will give the receipt upon check out process. Should you still need more assistance in regards to this matter kindly feel free to email us at sales.menteng-jakarta@frasershospitality.com

Mr. Park, once again thank you for your constructive feedback. Please do not hesitate to let me know if I can be of any assistance to you anytime.

text:
I had a nice stay at the 2BR (executive type) for my 10-days quarantine. The check-in process is seamless and the welcome staff guided me really well. I was skeptical at first but turned out the room was very spacious, clean, and well equipped. The hotel allowed me to even borrow a yoga-mat for me to exercise during the quarantine. They also prepared a full box of water bottles inside the room.

The food for 10 days were good, some days it was just OK, but most days it is not bad at all. Food are always served hot and they came on time. The staff are very responsive too. So overall, I would recommend Fraser Menteng if you need to do a long quarantine in Jakarta.

The only downside is that some of the new towels in smelled like cigarettes and it would be better to have contactless service when delivering daily meals --  the restaurant staff could just leave the food on the table by the door (while pressing the bell 1-2x) - contactless, instead of waiting for us to open the door and pick it up.
title: 10-days Quarantine Stay

text:
I was there for 5 days of my quarantine plus 2 more nights for business reasons.  I was with my colleagues and we had 2 - 1 bedroom and 1-3 bedroom suite for 7 nights, totaling around $6,000 USD including our PCR tests and quarantine room service meals, and round trip 2 taxis.

And this was my second time visiting this location.

Overall they were good.  Although their price was fixed for quarantine stay and you don't have a choice on meal unless you directly order a quarantine menu of room service which is quite expensive.

And plus, a few things needed improvements.  I just wanted to point out a few things out of many I experienced.

1. A birthday party was going on at the restaurant on 1st floor where other guests were dining too.  And the party guests were very loud and noisy continuously for about little over an hour, not considering other diners. Even other local guests were looking over at them continuously. So, I asked the hotel staff to see if they can intervene someway, but the answer I got back was 'they are reserved guests'.  Suddenly, I felt like I was not welcomed.

2. One or two staff at the front desk lacks understanding basic English.  I asked the staff to pick up an original document (not a copy) they delivered to me that wasn't mine during my quarantine period.  I called and asked twice but the same staff replied with just 'Okay' but never came.  I ended up giving it back to them at the end of my quarantine.  And they were not aware of their document missing.  Most front desk staff are good with English and very friendly.

3. Because I had a long stay with a fixed price for quarantine and mandatory meal purchase that I could not avoid, I asked for some soft drink like a soda as a complimentary drink.  All I asked for was just one or two cans of Coca Cola. I would NEVER complain if they answered 'No' because I was just asking for a possibility.   But, instead of giving yes or no answer, simply they just neglected my question and never got back with me.  After waiting for a day or two, I asked again nicely but it was also not answered back.  Forget comp. soda, I didn't like the feeling that my requests were ignored.

Above 3 issues were just some of the things I experienced.

I originally wanted to give 3/5 rating but I'm increasing it to 4/5 because despite the situations I experienced above, vast majority of staff were all friendly and helpful.  Plus, they keep their facility clean. And they will provide as much as they can.  

And, overall, would I recommend this place?  Yes, I still would because it has the best value for the quality you are looking for.  There are other cheaper places but they just will not be as clean and good as this place and the staff here.
title: Great quarantine hotel for foreign visitors

text:
Room  

We were staying in 1 bedroom executive unit facing north with Monumen Nasional view. The room includes a small kitchen with basic cooking utensils and laundry machine in the bathroom with a bathtub. Even though we were enjoying our stay, I think there are still room for improvements; There are some minor stains on the wallpapers, lacking of power outlet can be a challenge, there were mold inside their double pane glass which is ruining the view, and the bathtub drain was not working (management team quickly fixed this for us).  

Note that although the north side have a better view, it is also facing a bright large LCD billboard that runs all day and night, if you are sensitive to light you might want to consider other views.

 Location  

Getting into the hotel can be a hassle and would need a bit of knowledge of the surrounding areas. That being said, the hotel itself located very close to the center of attractions with a lot of great dining place and shopping malls.

 Amenities  

Due to social distancing mandate from local government, the hotel put limitation on public areas such as swimming pool and respectfully follow the health and safety guidelines. That being said, public areas are still well maintained and cleaned up daily.

Service  

House keeping service was amazing, they helped us clean our bathroom to our kitchen.   And during pandemic, if you have free breakfast they'll make sure to deliver your breakfast in a timely manner.

The highlight of our stay experience was Yuri from the marketing team that went above and beyond to make sure we've got the best deal and enjoying our stay. He helped us with a lot of our requests from breakfast menu variation to our room maintenance. Thank you Yuri!
title: A World Class Hospitality Experience

text:
I've personally stayed at Fraser Residence Menteng and have my guests (a large band of traveling musicians) visiting from across the ocean stay here after I recommended my stay.  The hotel was helpful to set up multiple rooms even though the requests keep on being updated from our side.

The hotel rooms are spacious, with a built-in living-room space that makes it more homey.  The fully-equipped (with utensil, sink, and microwave) kitchen area makes it easy for business travelers who might not have time to dine out (although the location is very central to great supermarkets, restaurants, and coffee shops).  The best feature of the room is the washing machine and dryer, which allows long-term business travelers to never worry about dirty outerwear and intimate clothing.

The Relish restaurant at the lobby area also serves great drinks, beer, and selection of food (although slightly overpriced).  The pool is very nice to use and the gym is robustly useful for travelers to keep themselves fit.  There are some wonky parts of the hotel, such as usually the service being much more smooth for foreigners, but overall this is an excellent place to stay for those who'd like to stay long term in Jakarta.
title: Beautiful hotel with amenities for longer-term stay

text:
I had several business trip visit in Jakarta prior to this December and stayed in several different hotels, but after staying in Fraser Menteng, this is no doubt a bargain, because of several things:

1. The room is spacious, even their cheapest room is spacy. I booked the Studio Premier Room, but luckily i have a free upgrade to the One Bedroom 😁
2. Since this is a hotel-apartment type, it has many advantages compared to conventional hotels, there are utensils, electric stove, even washing machine with free detergent, loved it! We don't need to pay more for laundry
3. The TV is equipped with sound bar, and it's a smart tv, something that i rarely see in a hotel.

Things that could be improved:
The breakfast, it tastes very good but it should have more variety, but since i have got the best facilities I've mentioned above, who am i to argue anyway.

Overall, i am quite satisfied and i can say that Fraser Menteng is the first choice hotel to stay in Jakarta
title: Value for Money!

text:
We stayed on early september for a wedding at surrounding area, it turned out that i’ve made a good decision to stay at fraser residence menteng
Location;
Right in the middle of menteng area, where you can find some of legendary eateries in jakarta, about 1km from gambir tran station, presidential palace and monas
The room itself (room 1006) has 2 bedrooms, perfect for us with 2 teenage kids, windows facing to “tugu tani” 
Room has safe box,microwave, kitchen supplies,fridge,good tv channel,aircon works properly.
Hotel facilities;
Good size pool,sauna,24H gym,etc,etc...
All staff from the front desk, bellboy, doorman/bellboy, and security staff are super nice, This is true Indonesian hospitality at its best !!
Also i read some negatives reiview abiut the bfast, what negative?? Good & decent spread of bfast buffet, u can have ur freshly brewed cappuccino & egg cook to your liking...
All in all my experience stay at fraser residence menteng is very satisfying, will be back for sure, highly recommended.
title: Hospitality at its best

text:
Advantages:
Overall this is a highly recommended apartment hotel in Menteng of Jakarta. I stayed in the premier one-bedroom apartment which is on higher floor. The room was clean, spacious with modern interior design. The Smart TV in the living room comes with built-in Netflix app that allows you to log-in your account and watch some films away from home. The sound bar for the TV is a plus. The bathroom is fully equipped with a washing machine/dryer. The toilet comes with bidet. Only the shower water was not hot enough sometimes. And the water pressure could be higher. 
The breakfast is delicious with various choices everyday. Staff are helpful and friendly.

Disadvantages:
There is no minimart around the hotel. In the in-room brochure it mentions there is a mini grocery store on B1 floor, but I’m not sure if it’s still open for business since the staff never mentioned it while check-in.
During my stay I needed more shower gel and a fresh bathrobe so I called reception from the in-room telephone. Staff said he would contact the housekeeping team regarding my request, but they never showed up the rest of the day. The next day I tried again, but still didn’t get what I requested, and I had to go to the housekeeping staff I heard outside of my rooms to get the shower gel and bathrobe. 
The main door of the room is not quite sound proving. People walking and talking outside the room could be heard easily.
title: Great apartment hotel for the price.

text:
Our family booked a 2 bedroom apartment  for 2 nights and selected this property due to its central  location in the city and in particular due to its proximity to Gambir train station as we had planned to take a train to Surabaya from this station.

The two bedroom apartment was clean and came with a master bedroom with its ensuite bathroom with shower and standalone shower and a second bedroom with a non-ensuite bathroom with a shower.  The kitchen was fully equipped with a stove top, microwave, stove top and full sized refrigerator.  The non-ensuite bathroom was small and a washing machine was crammed into it 

I enjoyed the refreshing 25meter pool as well as the steam and sauna facilities which were well maintained.

The breakfast buffet was more than sufficient and was of above average quality  so I am unsure as to why certain reviewers complained of the breakfast. We also had not problem with the free wifi and it was stable during our stay.

Staff at all levels that we encountered were pleasant and efficient however I felt the reception/lobby should be less cluttered and spruced up bit with a slight face lift.
title: A pleasant and efficient property

text:
We stayed here for 3 nights in October 2018, at the end of our 17 day trip to Indonesia !! We chooses the two bedroom apartment!!

The price for a “claimed “ 5* was convenient!! The kitchen was well equipped!! The location in general is in the heart of the city!! Security is top notch!! Check in and out is very smooth !! Elevator is fast!!

1) cleanliness : there is a big issue as the property is not clean AT ALL and i don’t consider it a 5 star hotel AT ALL!! Say 3 star maybe at most !! The furniture is all stained and old !! The housekeeping is very weak and needs two training and supervision !! The bathroom amenities are very very basic and cheap !! 2) Breakfast: it was very very very limited !! I was literally eating corn flakes and omelets every single morning as no variety!! Sometimes it took for ever to get a small portion of omelet as they get overwhelmed with the crowd although the space is very small to accommodate big numbers !!The breakfast place is soo small and sometimes difficult to even find a table to sit in! No place to walk when it is crowded! Was not comfortable at all !! 3) the front disk staff were very rigid and robotic !! But they tried to help especially when I had an issue with my private driver!! 4) the rooms smells and even when you ask the housekeeping to change the linen he just ignore it and do nothing!! I guess the housekeeping needs more training !! 5) in room dinning is a nightmare!! Couldn’t even swallow it !! In general this property needs serious lift up and makeover to earn 5* level !! I don’t think I will come again or recommend it IF it stays at the same level !
title: Not a 5* Hotel AT ALL

Oh, and breakfast selection are great too! Will come back here for sure (or maybe try the other Fraser in Setiabudi / Sudirman).

There is no room service available either and the restaurant is closed due to renovations, again this info should be disclosed as I paid the full normal price. Had I known that the property is under construction I would have booked somewhere else.

Service is so poor and needs to improve.

Total waste of time - not up to Fraser residence standards!

text: I booked 2 units of 2-bedroom apartment for my family and stayed there for 2 nights for a family event held at a restaurant which is located very close to the apartment. They let me get in to our room at 11 AM as I requested when all is clean and ready. This was very helpful as my parents need a rest immediately. We were very impressed with the apartment size which is very spacious and worth the money we spent. Each apartment is equipped with microwave, oven, electric stove, fridge, washing machine, iron & iron board, dining ware for 4 persons, cutleries, cooking ware, kitchen utensils. Everything is prepared completely with attention to details. Loved the cleanliness and the privacy, not to mention the high security standard provided since we entered the front gate. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast selections and it was delicious! All staffs are friendly and helpful too. Thank you, Fraser Residence Menteng! My family and I are very happy and enjoyed our stay.. and we will definitely come back again !

text:
We booked this two bedroom premier full serviced apartment # 1506. Opened in 2014, the size is 90m² & it is a spacious room with kitchen, living room and two bedrooms. One king size master room with inside bathroom & twin single bedroom with outside bathroom.
The room facility is full furnished with plates, bowls, wine glass, coffee glass, microwave, electric stoves, oven & big refrigerator. The rooms are clean & bathrooms are well arranged. The rooms have many clothes cabinets & drawers. Those who have lots of stuffs & things would like it. My kids & Mrs. like it very much. Only just found out the two bathrobes were not changed yet, because some stains seen & the other was messy inside the wall cabinet. 

Greeted by the reception in an efficient lobby, & next to breakfast area & swimming pool. The apartment is located right next to Kanisius Catholic school. Its location in the city center of Jakarta & nearby Monas (National Monument). Close by to Grand Indonesia & Plaza Indonesia. 
Staffs are smiley, helpful, & friendly.

It's definitely a 4* on ksw notes.

text:
I awoke from a nap and thought I was in Bogota. It took me a while to realize that I was in yet another functional-modular residence. Something about 'residences' depresses me - hotel rooms seem acute and curable while their long-term cousins reek of chronic loneliness. 

The staff are nice, the gym adequate, the bedroom and living room big, and the kitchenette useful. The desk was tiny. The location ... meh. Jakarta is not a very walkable city (nor drivable for half of the day) so get used to cabbing.
title: Friendly place

owner_response.text:
Dear Sir, 

Thank you for your constructive feedback and on areas that we have delighted you and areas that we can improve upon.   As we offer various types and sizes of the apartments, we hope that you will be able to try out our 1-Bedroom which is not only larger in size but also has a larger study desk.                                                                                                                                      Being a serviced apartment located on the prestigious residential area of Menteng yet only 10 min's drive to the city center's entertainment hub, our property and its overall decorations coupled with recreational facilities eg 24-hr Gym, a Residents' Lounge, The Retreat with massage chairs etc tend to make up for the number of restaurants or bars/lounges traditionally available in a hotel.     Once again, thank you and we look forward to welcome you back to Jakarta soon.   Kind regards.  Patricia NG
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I spent 4 days at Fraser's and I was impressed with the facility, the rooms and especially the staff. The building I think is brand new and the apartments are also brand new.

When I arrived, one of their staff rushed out to help me with my luggage. That was very nice! Check-in was quick and effortless and I was escorted to my room. 

The real surprise was my room... I had booked a 1 bedroom suite and it was enormous. The furnishings were crisp and contemporary, the bed was very comfortable, the kitchenette was well equipped with top of the line appliances, the bathroom was spacious, and there was a washer/dryer in the unit so I could wash my own clothes. It honestly felt like a home away from home.

The next day I had breakfast and dinner in the restaurant. The menu, while not extensive was thoughtfully planned out and the food was nicely prepared and presented. Service was prompt and attentive. The staff were pleasant and efficient. The restaurant looks out over a large infinity swimming pool which I did not have time to try, but it looks very nice... It would be perfect for children.

What I was really impressed with, aside from how nice my room was, were the staff. Everyone was pleasant and friendly. The housekeepers were efficient, and my room was always clean and neat. The front desk staff were helpful and knowledgable. 

When I was getting ready to leave, I had a very early flight to catch... I was leaving Frasers at 5AM. They had a taxi waiting for me, the restaurant chef came in early to make me a take-away breakfast (quite a surprise as I didn't order anything!), and the Front Desk manager and Rooms Manager also were there to see me off! I have rarely experienced this kind of thoughtfulness anywhere.

I will definitely return and stay again at Frasers Menteng. I really enjoyed my short stay there and the service was 5 stars.
title: Outstanding Experience!

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr Augustino, 

Firstly thank you for taking the time to give us your constructive feedback.   There is no excuse for some teething challenges currently faced in our first few weeks of soft-opening.  

Steps have been taken to intensify training for our restaurant staff as well as stepped up on our daily and monthly pest control for all apartments and public areas.  Rest assured that we do take these comments seriously.

As for the notice at the Pool Towel Station, we sincerely regret that there must be a misunderstanding as the message is a standard of which is also found in our other sister property ie "Kindly return to reception same number of towel borrowed after use.  Towel not returned will be charged US$15/ each to your room" .  This is to encourage all our guests to kindly return the soiled towel to the same place they took the towels from and for our control of inventory.    

Mr Augustino, once again thank you for your constructive feedback which enables us to improve on the areas that have fallen short of expectation.   However, we do hope that this incident has not marred your overall experience and that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back again to see the improvements that have been made.   

With regards.  Patricia Ng - General Manager

text:
ジャカルタは移動にタクシーが必須ですが、
便利な立地です。
セキュリティも万全、スタッフもとても親切です。
部屋は広く、とても清潔でバスタブがあるのが嬉しいです。
外食に飽きても、簡単なお料理ができるキッチンと食器も完備されているので、好きな食材を揃えてお料理するのも楽しいです。
タクシー数分でスーパーもあり、買い物には困りません。徒歩はおすすめしません。
朝食は品数は少なめですが問題ありません。
ただ品数少ない上にメニューに変わりがないので、
連泊は飽きてしまいます。
短期、中期間滞在のビジネスで利用する方も多く
ホテル内は静かで落ち着いた雰囲気です。
また利用したいと思います。
title: 快適なアパートメント

text: Прекрасный отель с отличными номерами. Отдыхали с друзьями (семейная пара) 7 дней. У нас был номер с двумя спальнями и у каждого отдельная ванная комната со всем необходимым. Даже напольные весы. Номер оборудован всем необходимым для отличного отдыха. В номере есть большой холодильник, электроплита, посуда, микроволновка и т.д.  Завтраки чудесные. Практически не повторялись. Ужин в ресторане отеля тоже отличный. Хороший бассйен, СПА, хамам и сауна. Есть детская комната. Персонал приветливый, дружелюбный, готовый решить все проблемы. Спасибо всем за отличный отдых.
title: Отель великолепный!!!!!!!!!!!

text:
Апартаменты великолепны! 
Мы отдыхали с нашими друзьями (супружеская пара) в апартаментах с 2 спальнями. Все было просто замечательно!
Апартаменты находятся рядом с Монас, до Плаза Индонезия пешком минут 15-20.
Отель очень чистый и я бы сказала - со своей изюминкой.
Апартаменты новые, очень хорошая мебель, бытовая техника (стиральная машина, варочная поверхность, вытяжка) фирмы ТЕКА, что уже говорит о качестве!!!
Есть все для приготовления пищи (кастрюли, сковороды, тарелки, кухонные приборы, бокалы и т.д.). Все новое. Есть средство для мытья посуды и для стиральной машины, а также полотенца для кухни! Большой холодильник и микроволновка. Ежедневно пополняется питьевая вода(бесплатно). 
Очень удобные кровати. Удобная ванная комната ( у нас их было 2) со всем необходимым (шампунь, гель, мыло, фен и т.д.). В апартаментах есть халаты и тапочки. 
В каждой спальне и в гостинной есть телевизор, кондиционер.
Завтраки просто прекрасные! Ресторан вообще очень не плохой, мы там ужинали.
Хороший, большой бассейн (есть и детский). Есть СПА салон, но надо заранее записываться, причем массаж делают качественно. Также есть бесплатная сауна и хамам, а также спортивный зал.
Понравилось, что при въезде в отель проверяют все машины и багаж в целях безопасности. 
Персонал очень внимательный и доброжелательный. готовый помочь во всем!!!
Большое спасибо сотрудникам отеля за их труд и внимательность!
Я всем смело рекомендую этот замечательный отель!
title: Великолепные апартаменты!

text: جميع مافي الفندق ممتاز من نظافة وامان ومرافق ماعدا موظفي الاستقبال فهم سيئون جداً ولا يليقون بواجهة مجموعة فريزر تعاملهم مع العملاء بتعالي وايضاً يحاولون إعطاء النزيل غرفة غير التي في حجزه ايضاً يعيب الفندق انه بعيد عن الخدمات لابد من سيارة المطعم الموجود بالفندق رائع

text: شقق فندقية جميلة و مريحة ، اخذت غرفتين وصالة و دورتين مياة ، كانت اقامة موفقه ، الخدمة جيده ، الشقة واسعة ، الاثاث ممتاز ، المواقف متوفرة ، الامن عالي ، عيبها ان الموقع بعيد قليلا عن الاماكن الحيوية من اسواق و مطاعم <
title: الراحة و الأمان

text: выбрали этот отель из за очень хорошего места рассположения и отличной цены, великолепный вид из окна практически на весь район, порадовала достаточно просторная спальня с большой кроватью и удобным матрасом, не смотря на то что отель в центре -в номер очень тихо
title: удобно расположен

text:
大晦日から元旦にわたって宿泊しました。

エレベーターホールに入るにも部屋のカードがないと入ることができないので、セキュリティー面では安心できました。チェックインのカウンターは2つしかないので、チェックインに多くの人がいれば少し時間がかかりますが、対応は非常によかったです。

室内もきちんと清掃されていて清潔で、長期滞在も可能なようにキッチンや食器それから洗濯機が浴室においてあるので便利です。アメニティも必要十分なものが置いてあり、洗濯機の洗剤まで用意されていたので感心しました。

大晦日には1階のレストランで子どもたち含めて食事をしました。残念ながら予約が遅かったので室内ではなくテラス席で少し暑い上、蚊もいたので虫よけは必要です。店の方は子どもにも親切できちんとサービスが行き届いていました。大晦日ということもあってか、生演奏のバンドもいたり、くじ引きで無料スウィート宿泊券も当てたり、非常に楽しい滞在でした。ただ、料金は大晦日なのか料理の種類があまりないですが、アルコールなしが50万ルピア、アルコール飲み放題つきが70万ルピアと少し高い感じがしましたが、料理はおいしく不満はありませんでした。

全体として満足でしたが、チェックインがもう少しスムースにできること、ブッフェの料理数がもう少しあれば大満足でした。
title: 家族連れでも安心の清潔なホテル

text: La habitación tiene amplio espacio y equipamiento. Todo está limpio y cómodo, en el  televisor hay canales en varios idiomas, no solo el local. El personal del staff es muy amable y servicial. La ubicación es muy buena si se va  a visitar las principales atracciones locales y hay un servicio de traslado para ir de compras
title: Amplitud y ubicación

text: Hotel nuovo, molto confortevole, nella posizione centrale della città. Le camere sono dotate di ogni confort e dotate di una mini cucina, completamente attrezzata, il bagno è moderno ben rifinito e dotato di ogni confort, compreso set da bagno rinnovato ogni giorno. L'area colazione si affaccia sulla piscina esterna, molto bella e pulita.
